Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Techsavy
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly decent phone for its price.I bought this after I ended up returning a few for technical and quality issues.This one has none.Set up was a breeze. Conecting to Tmobile  was simple.The network works fine.The apps are great,I have downloaded most of my favorite ones.Overall a great phone for an extremely reasonable price.I would recommend this to anyone who wants a decent Android phone and save substantial money.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Y. Tison
Reviews.Content: I finally figured out how too hook up this phone.  It works great.it runs off tmobile or alltell towers.  Depending on what company u hook it up with.  It is a standard sim.  U can buy the sim card here.  U need a micro sd card too download apps.  Buy the larger one if u download alot or record alot. Not the 2 or the 4 not enough memory. There is a really good video camera on it with both back and front faceing cameras. The apn setting does have too be set on ur phone.  But whoever provider u call too activate ur phone tells u how too do it. If u cant understand them or they dont understand u because most of them r from freakin India, they can email u the instructions. It must be a job qualification that all telemarketers have to be from India. Lol the phone is great. It works great and it has a 5" screen. I love it. No wonder it keeps selling out at that price. And download battery saver in ur playstore. It helps.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Network Issue
Reviews.Author: Qutub Siddiqui
Reviews.Content: Its very hard to receive a call, there is always issue with network. Just wondering if this phone can be return or replaced. Now it is also available on another site with only $53.99.

Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for. I would. Definitely do business with you again in the future! Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Piss Poor Performance !
Reviews.Author: Antoine Cade
Reviews.Content: Bad phone would not recommend anyone to purchase it, cam equip with two batteries a case and head phones; overly dressed for a poor performance phone broke within three days started with screen issues and moved on to vocal with earpieces malfunctioning. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR AND THIS IS NOT WORTH IT!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy THis Phone!!!.....updated 12/18/13
Reviews.Author: janet johnson
Reviews.Content: I get pop up messages that are in Chinese, most of the pre-loaded apps do not work, I cannot send or receive pictures (in messages), I have to charge several times a day, the instruction book is poorly written and incomplete. The box that it came in was damaged and the case was broken. There are so many problems with this phone and the company that I purchased from says send it back and they might refund my money.* Latest update....Amazon has now denied my claim and I have been instructed to send the item back at my expense, plus insurance and I MAY get a refund. The phone will no longer charge so I cannot delete my personal information. This is a very expensive paper weight! Nomoreracks does not treat it's customers this poorly and will get my business going forward!

Reviews.Content: Stylish looks.  Very poor quality.  Not worth its weight in garbage.  Seem to have the potential to be a good phone, but this one probably a faulty one.

Reviews.Title: SVP android
Reviews.Author: Nestor R. Ortiz "Ortiz"
Reviews.Content: The phone did not work at capacity upon receipt. I believe that the phone was defective and returned it. The concept is great. It offers all the features expected of an android phone and more. If they worked properly, it would be a great phone. Additionally, it only workes to 3G as full capacity. If you expect a phone to be used solely for calls, e-mails and texts, this is a fine phone. Do not download pics, video or music as it says it is capable, but cannot read.

Reviews.Title: Review of ordered goods.
Reviews.Author: Dorothy McKnight
Reviews.Content: I have not yet received the display screen protector Scratch Resistant Pet film. I wobder if I will ever get it.The unlocked quadband dual sim Android  came on time, and it has met all  my expectations. I am proud of it, and will be willing to tell others about it.

I had to talk very loudly for the person on the other end to even hear me. Overall i give this particular product only one star i kept it only because i desperately needed to have a phone.

Reviews.Content: One of them didn't even work, and one of the others has a bad charger or cord to charger. I would like very much for you to replace them. We had an early Christmas, and had given them as gifts not knowing they didn't work.

Reviews.Content: very good phone works with all the operator here in Venezuela, the only difficulty is placed into one of the sim in one perfect but the other input trim the sim, because it is a little smaller, otherwise is a perfect happy cell with the...

Reviews.Title: It is exactly what I expected it to be.
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Don't worry about all of the reviews!!! I purchased it before I read them and was suuuper scared! But after I got it I realized it wasn't that bad at all. Sometimes the screen is a little slower than my fingers and so it freezes up, but so far I haven't had any major issues. The sound is rather low on incoming and out going calls but works fine if you turn on the speaker. It is NOT a Samsung... so if that is what you want don't buy it... but it works for me... and when you first turn it may be in Chinese but turn it off and then back on it should be fixed.

Reviews.Title: fair
Reviews.Author: Virgilio
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap one, it is like a cheap toy, or better saying: better this than nothing; is something you don't have to worry if you lose it or spoil it. It can be good while you save enough money to buy a very good one...wi fi works with strong internet signal and in a very reduce range

Reviews.Content: It's good for voice calls and texting (SMS). I use it with Lycamobile (US). Battery so/so - 1 day max. :(Delivery was on time. :)

Reviews.Title: Not what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Annoyed
Reviews.Content: This phone does not have a dual camera as the description says. It looks cheap and was not what I expected at all from the description, so I sent my phone back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: It works good. Internationally, it isnt currently working not sure if the wireless carrier has to unlock it or not

Reviews.Title: I put in my cart a Samsung Galaxy Gran Duos, white and what was my surprise when I received this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Guiga
Reviews.Content: I live in Brazil and purchased a Gran Duos but due to some error in AMAZON.COM i received this phone instead. I sent it to be delivered at my sister who was in NY for vacation, so when she received it she opened up the box, put the phone in her suitcase without the box and travelled home.I have no box, I cannot return it from Brazil and I did not receive what I wanted! The cell looks like a copycat of the galaxy but a very bad copy! I want to know who will be responsible for this mistake???? Who will reinburse me of all this agravattion???Will someone contact me  about this?????

Reviews.Title: the dual sim phone
Reviews.Author: H. Y. Ramsey
Reviews.Content: as we say here in America you get what you pay for, I didn't know the phone was a clone of the android sold by T-Mobile. since I am a T-Mobile customer, I trusted the name and bought the phone. I took the phone to one of T-Mobile outlets to find out why the phone was not operating properly. the first thing they told me was it was a clone and not supported, and that it is out dated by two years. because I travel abroad every year I wanted a phone that would serve my purpose here and abroad with  dual sim compatibilities. it's a joke. reception is horrible, but the sound quality is fine. I am still looking for a better phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Orlando
Reviews.Content: compre este telefono en mayo 2013 lo llebe al Salvador y Guatemala y solo puse un SIM card de TIGO con su numero y me trabajo sin problemas ya estaba liberado no nescesita de liberarlo ya esta LISTO solo de ponerle una targeta de memoria  yo lo use con La compania TIGOThis phone functions in El Salvador with a card from TIGO company. It's ready to use, its unlocked. Its a good phone.
